messages.title: Invitation to Join Islington Conservatives
messages.content: I am writing to introduce myself as the Conservative candidate for your constituency in this yearâ€™s General Election. I am a former teacher and charity worker who now works on social policy and lives in Archway with my wife and daughter.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservative long-term economic plan is working. The deficit is falling, Britain is the fastest growing, leading economy in Europe, there are 1.85 million more people in work and unemployment in Islington North has fallen by 56%. We have cut taxes for those on the lowest incomes and invested more in the education of our poorest pupils.
We have cut taxes for those on the lowest incomes and invested more in the education of our poorest pupils.

issues.economy: The Conservative long-term economic plan is working. The deficit is falling, Britain is the fastest growing, leading economy in Europe, there are 1.85 million more people in work and unemployment in Islington North has fallen by 56%.
issues.education: We have cut taxes for those on the lowest incomes and invested more in the education of our poorest pupils.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am a former teacher and charity worker who now works on social policy and lives in Archway with my wife and daughter.

images.caption: Alex Burghart engaged in conversations and meetings.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet criticizes the last Labour Government, mentioning that it damaged the nation's finances, undermined the international reputation of the country, discouraged people from taking work, and weakened the education of young people.
